In this exercise, we're going to build a responsive portfolio. You'll start out with some basic Bootstrap columns and add the rest as needed. Bootstrap classes used in this exercise include the responsive column classes and responsive utilities (e.g., .hidden-sm).

The screen is: xs sm md lg

Daniel Carter Just doing my job.

I'm an assistant professor of digital media at Texas State University. I research data and analytics, infrastructure, design and labor. This portfolio includes a few of my recent projects.

dcarter@txstate.edu | @danielwcarter
